label: Airport Parking
description: Parking services for travelers at airports.
intents: Reserve a parking spot at the airport
Find parking near a specific airport terminal
Find meet and greet parking services

subcategories.label: Meet and Greet Parking
subcategories.description: Parking services where a driver meets the traveler at the airport terminal.
subtopics: Meet and greet parking at Gatwick

subcategories.label: Long Stay Parking
subcategories.description: Parking services for travelers who need to park their car for an extended period of time.
subtopics: Long stay parking at Manchester airport

subcategories.label: Short Stay Parking
subcategories.description: Parking services for travelers who need to park their car for a short period of time.

subcategories.label: Hotel and Parking Packages
subcategories.description: Packages that include both a hotel stay and parking at the airport.
subtopics: Park and stay at Manchester airport

subcategories.label: Off-Site Parking
subcategories.description: Parking services located off-site from the airport.
